ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] More women playing EQ lately?
ygData.msgSnippet: I dunno. My sister was the one who got me into EQ in the first place. I know quite a few guys play female characters though.. There are alot of women in my
ygData.messageBody:
I dunno. My sister was the one who got me into EQ in the first place. I know
quite a few guys play female characters though..
There are alot of women in my guild. Some of them are mothers. I think it's
cool.
luv,
-Su

I just noticed recently that I seem to be running into more women while
running around Norrath. I mean characters played by women, is there any
truth to this, or did I just not care in the past and didn't notice? That
would be really cool if it were true.
